column6:
The Brood return! Carol Danvers is alone and powerless on Monster Island, surrounded by creatures that want her blood! Brian Reed (CAPTAIN MARVEL) and Aaron Lopresti (INCREDIBLE HULK) bring you a tale of monsters and the many faces of Ms. Marvel!,2007,12
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Greg Horn | penciller:Aaron Lopresti | writer:Brian Reed | inker:Matt Ryan | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
